S

saveScore(String, int) - Method in class de.jhh4.backend.HighscoreCenter
this method inserts the new score into the existing list and saves the list to the file most of it was written by ChatGPT 4.0 using the prompt: please write me a method that will read the provided document and enable me to insert an extra line at the appropriate position based on the score attained.
score - Static variable in class de.jhh4.logic.ScoreCounter
records the score
ScoreCounter - Class in de.jhh4.logic
keeps track of the score attained throughout the game currently stone is treated as gold and used for scoring purposes this can be changed in future versions

Structure - Class in de.jhh4.pieces
structures are built by units: a settler can build a town a worker can build a house therefore structures do not have cost or speed values however they have a range in which they collect ressources structures have a X,Y coordinate on the grid corresponding to the map array
